sentences.en: Cuba was originally inhabited by two Native American tribes: the hunter - gatherer Ciboney, and the agricultural Taino.
sentences.cn: 古巴最早的居民是两族美洲原住民 ︰ 猎食为生的西布尼人, 与务农为主的泰诺人.

sentences.en: He was eventually installed as official local news - gatherer of the town.
sentences.cn: 后来他被派正式担任本市的新闻采访员.

sentences.en: Is this essential to our survival in the hunter - gatherer sense of the world?
sentences.cn: 我们一定要字字斟酌 吗 ?

sentences.en: The hunter-gatherer lifestyle today survives precariously in remote regions.
sentences.cn: 今天狩猎采集的生活方式在偏远地区侥幸留存了下来。

sentences.en: They recorded the weight of the mushrooms each gatherer collected and where they visited.
sentences.cn: 这两名研究员记录下每个采蘑者的踪迹及其收集到的蘑菇总重量.

sentences.en: This response, I now think, was a throwback to an earlier age of the hunter - gatherer.
sentences.cn: 我现在认为, 这种反应是向狩猎采集时代的倒退.

sentences.en: Today they recognize that human foibles, biases and our hunter - gatherer origins can often be critical factors.
sentences.cn: 现在,他们认识到,人性的缺点 、 偏见和打猎 - 采摘的起源,这些因素通常也很关键.

words.tran_cn: 收集；收割；使…聚集；使…皱起
